pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, November 29, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:15 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with Mexico’s Undersecretary for North America, Jesús Seade, to discuss ratification of the new NAFTA.

Lester B. Pearson Building
125 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity prior to the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
